alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 03 at 9:27PM MST until December 04 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches with local amounts up to 4 inches. Freezing rain expected in far southern Malheur County late tonight through Sunday morning with total ice accumulation less than a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...In Idaho, Owyhee Mountains zone. In Oregon, Harney County and Malheur County zones. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
